Title: Relates to procurement reform in cities with a population of a million or more
Summary: Relates to procurement reform in cities with a population of a million or more by requiring certain bids to be rejected; gives standing to certain elected officials to sue on behalf of those injured due to a contractor's negligence.
LawCode: Amd ยง103, add ยง103-h, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to procurement reform
